name: Raft: Surviving in the ocean
description: Raft: Surviving in the ocean - crafting and survival game where you are traveler and now you're lost! No civilization! Only cold salt water, raft and shark! To survive you have to catch a sea of trash and improve with the help of his own raft. Also, in order to survive it needs food and fresh water. And do not forget about the shark! The game has an advanced crafting system and will be interesting to people who loves craft and survival games
